english_example_sentence: You must have heard interesting news last night.
russian_example_sentence: Ты, должно быть, слышал(а) интересные новости прошлой ночью.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen dün gece ilginç bir haber duymuşsun.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen dün gece ilginç bir haber ______.
